resources.string: Introducing new Doritos®️ Flamin’ Hot Cool Ranch®️ Flavored Tortilla Chips, an all-new mash-up that combines the classic Cool Ranch flavor fans love with a spicy, bold crunch.

The Halwani Bros Beef Burger is incredibly tasty and delicious.
The tender and chewy meat coupled with other condiments make it a very filling meal.
Perfect to share with family and friends.
Its great in taste.

The Qualiko Whole Chicken is your ideal choice for when you are hosting a family dinner or having friends over for a party. It is a Halal chicken and can be used in cooking varieties of dishes like curries, soups and rice.
شيبسي عملك طعمين جداد من كنتاكي أوريجينال و زنجر ! طعم كان لازم يحصل !
Crack open a yummy block to release the sweet nut crunch.
Have a rejuvenating and enriching experience with the President Feta Cheese. Its soft and creamy texture perfectly melts into your mouth for a tantalizing feel.

Enjoy the taste of fresh fruits with Vitrac Strawberry Cream Jam.
You can prepare a delicious sandwich with creamy Vitrac jam with fresh strawberry flavor.
Vitrac’s creamy strawberry jam is rich with pureed fruit.
Its creamy texture gives a smooth natural fruit taste that is easy to spread, perfect for desserts and quick sandwiches.

Enjoy an intense snacking experience with the President triangle cheese.
This cheese offers a rich flavor to satisfy your taste buds.
It is pre-cut in triangular, bite-sized pieces for convenient snacking.
You can consume this cheese by itself or even add as a topping to various foods like pizzas, pasta, crackers and toasts.
It ranks high in nutrients and is sure to provide you optimal nourishment.
Almarai Treats Strawberry Tart Yogurt - 100 gm
